website_summaries.verdict: There’s no beating the truly impressive burn time of 17 hours per inch, so if you value a long and clean burning pillar candle, these are for you.
pros: Also available in yellow and mandarin colors
153 hour burn time for large pillar candle
cons: Some color and size combos may be unavailable

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a scented candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle is beautiful and burns nicely, but there is absolutely not scent whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candle but...
customer_reviews.text: Burns beautifully; very long life; no dripping. However, there is no discernible scent. I was looking forward to a lemongrass scent as that is how it is marketed; but alas- nothing. Still, very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Joton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dripless candles.
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. I have purchased them in many beautiful colors and lengths. They last a long time and do not drip. I get many compliments and no longer have to deal with wax stained table cloths. I do not have problems with the candles fittings in my candle stick holders as some reviewers have indicated. But I agree with other reviewers that the wax is soft enough to mold or shave them to fit. For long candles I either melt a bit of wax into the holder first, or place sticky wax to secure the candle. You will not be disappointed with these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Everitt (Sconset919@aol.com)

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best candles anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best candles anywhere. I love having candles on my dinner table and have purchased many different kinds, brands, colors, etc. Root candles are by far the best quality. They don't drip and they burn evenly. The price may seem on the high side, but for me they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stockbridge

customer_reviews.title: No Aroma! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm not impressed with these candles. Only if the aroma match their height they would be awesome on a nice relaxing evening. I unfortunately bought three different candles lavender, Mulled Cider and Crisp Autumn I don't smell either one over the others. Hoping the three different aroma would take me to Nirvana, they have done the exact opposite. They took me to the state disappointment. The only reason why I gave them two star is the length. Pretty weak!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Autumn Color is Off
customer_reviews.text: Root burns very smoothly. All colors that I have tried are true except for for Autumn which is more bone marrow red/rusty red. The image show a dark pumpkin- this is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: GardeniaForever

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These candles have a beautiful rustic finish, are long lasting, and practically dripless. Love the orange color, too. I will be buying them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Scentless
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a scented candle you expect it to have a scent. Neither when extinguished nor when burning is there any hint of "tangerine lemongrass." It is a perfectly functional candle but if I were just buying an unscented candle I would never pay this much.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Capri

customer_reviews.title: Great candles, one of the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Great candles, make sure you put them perfectly vertical to make sure they don't drip. They CAN drip, but only if they are on a slight angle. Also, I've noticed that these burn almost perfectly clean, no weird black smoke and no worries about gunk building up on my ceiling like an old European cathedral.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Quality, well-made candles
customer_reviews.text: I really love these candles! They had the unique color I was looking for and burn cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Moncure

customer_reviews.title: Last minute candle shopping
customer_reviews.text: After driving around to 5 stores to no avail. I ordered these Root candles just days before Thanksgiving. Absolutely perfect, just what I was looking for. I didn't want to buy 12 but it turns they won't last long the way I am using and enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: UNSCENTED. False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a scented candle. Not this. Will avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: kim russell

customer_reviews.title: This is an unscented candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle is a very nice candle except that it was advertised as a scented candle and it is definitely not scented. Not even a little bit. I gave it a 4 star because it is still a nice candle but I think it was an advertising mistake and not a reflection of the candle itself.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase these candles.
customer_reviews.text: Quality at a reasonable price. I've bought several of these, and each has burned evenly and smelled great without being overwhelming. Also the pattern on the exterior makes this a sightly addition to my living space. Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Too costly for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Color is pretty but there is absolutely no scent whatsoever. Much better candles out there for a cheaper prices at.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these candles! The color is perfect! I wanted a good fall color and these fit the bill. They are between an orange and a red. Perfect! I like the ribbing in the candles. I haven't burnt them yet so I can't comment on that. They look elegant. I am very happy with these and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Just Judy

customer_reviews.title: "Scented"?  Hardly.
customer_reviews.text: This candle comes with a label that says best results are achieved after burning for several hours, but even after two or three this candle's scent is barely noticeable. It does burn evenly, but when I buy a scented candle I want to experience the scent. There's also nothing even vaguely akin to the aroma of mulled cider with this one. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: HiDefBear

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & refreshing scent.
customer_reviews.text: This candle is beautiful, a large size that is statuesque on our piano. The scent is lovely - not over powering or too floral, rather it is fresh like fall outdoor scents.
customer_reviews.author: Christie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in how candles burned. One they didn't burn evenly and second they didn't last long. They became a river of wax coming out the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this candle has such a minimal scent, I could not detect it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle , hoping the ROOT candle lable would assure me of a quality scented candle. It burns nicely, but does not have a scent that I can smell. I am disappointed, but it burns.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Very nice candles. Love the color. Perfect for fall.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous candles! I love the colors...very unique. I need to buy another set in a different color because I keep them up always and need a little variety. Strongly recommend Root Candles.
customer_reviews.author: Blee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely High End Candle
customer_reviews.text: I have not received it as yet, with that being said, I have the 3 inch cinimmon candle. It is lovely looks great with my decor, the scent is nice, wish it were a bit stronger. Highly recommend. I would like to also add, it has significant subststance to it.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles, Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice candles at a great price. The autumn color is really perfect to use for any of the fall holidays. I bought these for Halloween, but they would be beautiful at Thanksgiving too.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy on my favorite candles and a really pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Susu

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: I generally live the quality of these candles, but I ordered two and they aren’t the same color. :(
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: These are great! 100% drip-free and the textured look is awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great! 100% drip-free and the textured look is awesome. Worth paying a bit more for over generic candles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoefner

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a scented candle but the candle sent had no scent.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: It may look like a candle and smell like a candle BUT....
customer_reviews.text: It is not a candle. Not in my book anyway. At first it burned way too fast. Then the wick was hidden under wax every time I went to light it. So I had to dig around for it. Upon finding it, I lit is and once again the wax began burning wildly and unevenly, pouring all over the table. A very sad experience, since I burn candles, precisely for relaxation, and it became a stressful battle. I requested a refund and ordered a second DecoGlow Purify 3-Inch by 6-Inch Pillar Candle. The DecoGlow is a MUCH better bet!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina C. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking dor and could find at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: trouble with dripping wax
customer_reviews.text: The candles look fine but once lit, my table cloth was replete with dripping wax - the colour won't come out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Burns itself out
customer_reviews.text: The wick burns itself out, extinguished by its own wax. After the first burning or two, it is impossible to see the flame—for the short while before it dies out completely. Poorly constructed candle.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Japikse

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in how candles burned. One they didn't burn evenly and second they didn't last long. They became a river of wax coming out the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Root Candles really the best looking and burning
customer_reviews.text: As always, Root Candles really the best looking and burning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The candles were the color I wanted, plus I ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles were the color I wanted, plus I ordered the candles late in the day & they were delivered the very next day! Wow was that fast ir what!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MULLED CIDER
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it is long lasting. I hope they come out with bigger sizes soon. It was worth the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Only the Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried LOTS of candles, but Root is the ONLY one that lives up to it's expectations.... and it's cost. Worth every penny! (Great smell, too!)
customer_reviews.author: S. Schirmer

customer_reviews.title: Root speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say anything about root that hasn't been said before. It is one of the best and always will be.
customer_reviews.author: Zeusapollo

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite candles, but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but not my favorite candles. I had a really hard time fitting these in any of my candleholders without compressing them or shaving them down first. The color was more orange than a rusty brown like I was hoping for. They did burn well, almost dripless. However, I would like to know what “beeswax enhanced” means as well as why the description on some of these listings say these candles are scented. These tapers were not scented.
customer_reviews.author: Simply.mrs.z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Candles
customer_reviews.text: Great candles! I love the look, feel, color and the fact they are made in the USA. Will definitely purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, do drip if that matters to you
customer_reviews.text: Quality is nice. These candles do drip! We have some quality candles that burn slower than these and do not drip at all. These are solid color. They burned about half way down during an event that lasted ~4hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely zero sent to this candle no Mandarin at all nothing zero
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely zero Cent. Zero! Not even a hint of mandarin!!! Awful awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wooozes

customer_reviews.title: Burns off center and I have to cut wax down ...
customer_reviews.text: Burns off center and I have to cut wax down often. I burn in for over an hour at a time so we aren't talking short burn times. Scent is very faint.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL CANDLES
customer_reviews.text: I USE A GOOD AMOUNT OFCANDLES IN MY HOME, THESE ARE BY FAR THE BEST IN COLOR AND ARE SO DURABLE. SO GLAD I FOUNDTHEM ON AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: ELLE

customer_reviews.title: Truly clean burning and dripless candles
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get these candles because I wasn’t sure if they were dripless. I glad to report that they are truly dripless and clean burning.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candle. Rich colour and extremely well made. Interesting texture.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: thick and sturdy with tapered base that fit well into the holder
customer_reviews.text: color was very accurate. thick and sturdy with tapered base that fit well into the holder.
customer_reviews.author: kathy hutto

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality candle, beautiful candle
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to burn but the candles were perfect for our sconces. Nice texture on the outside and visually beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: AvidShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Not too fragrant but nice. I have asthma and it does not bother me like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne P.

customer_reviews.title: Burns straight and sweet!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern wasn't actually the scent (which is the point of this candle), but rather how well it burns. Too often, I purchase candles that burn unevenly or lack a strong outer wall that protects the candle's longevity. However, this burns straight down the center, keeping it clean. Also, this "Pumpkin Spice" scent is great! Especially if you're a fan of pumpkin pie.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Candle colors you want when you want them!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because they are the color of my dining room, and love to use these on my table. Can't find this color except in early fall, and never enough of them. Arrived quickly, in pretty good shape. Two candles were slightly dented, but usable. Possibly needs packing within box, as there is none. Thought the color was a little off, but is close enough. Over all, am pleased. I would buy again, as well as refer others.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: Rust Color
customer_reviews.text: The photo for the rust color is not accurate. They are rust, of a light to medium rust. I would have preferred a two-pack, but, or even a multi-color, but, the rust that was sent is okay for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles.
customer_reviews.text: Great candles, great value. Comes in a nice box, could even use this for a gift. You do have to peel all of those black stickers off of every candle though, so if you're using a lot of them at once it's kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: SB in Colo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rust Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect candles for Fall - not orangey which I did not want. Root candles are very well made and a little pricey but you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife, I do not know much about them. She loves Root candles and believes they are the best made. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've used Root candles for years, and after a brief hiatus I bought more. I think they must be using less beeswax--they burn more quickly than they used to. I love the colors, but I'm disappointed compared to what they were.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles - just the right amount of colorful flair and not garish.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived promptly.. But I wanted a scented candle and I didn't get that. It fell short. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fragrant
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and fragrance without even lighting them. Not a solid orange which is exactly what I wanted.mthey arrived perfect with no chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: They burn well and are of great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these candles many times. They burn well and are of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R. Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Will buy them in other colors. No smoke or dripping for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Tricolor

customer_reviews.title: Root candles are superb!
customer_reviews.text: Root candles are worth the price! They are fabulous and come in great colors along with two different lengths. They add to any dinner table setting and are very classy.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle

customer_reviews.title: love these candles
customer_reviews.text: I Wish these candles were a little cheaper, but the scent is great and the quality seems good! :) I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Root Timberline Candles
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful - fair price. I ordered them as a gift - wish I had ordered some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thilo

product_meta.title: Root Candles Unscented Timberline Pillar Candle , 3 x 9-Inches, Rust
product_meta.description: Color:Rust| Style:Large PillarFinely crafted, hand-poured pillar candles are a marvel to behold as they gently fold inward while burning, giving these self-consuming candles exceptional candle life. Every Root pillar candle self-extinguishes for added peace of mind. Fresh, earthy Timberline pillars capture the bold spirit of rustic beauty and look as at home in a formal setting as a casual display. Hewn to popular sizes, each Timberline top is highlighted by an artistic canopy of treelike branches while the candle's trunk echoes the natural simplicity of smooth bark. Root Candles continues the values, knowledge, and zeal that founder Amos Ives Root kindled over 140 years ago; each candle is crafted with quality, innovation and excellence.
feature_bullets: UNSCENTED PILLAR CANDLE: Deep rust color; Also offered in 21 other bold hues
DIMENSIONS: Measures 3 x 9-Inches and available in three sizes
LONG-LASTING: Timberline pillars burn an impressive 17 hours per inch
UNIQUELY TEXTURED: Timberline Candles have a fresh, earthy texture that echoes the natural simplicity of bark
ESTABLISHED SINCE 1869: Root Candles of Medina, Ohio, has been an industry-leading, family-owned company renowned for innovative ideas, aesthetic enhancements that the highest standards of quality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Guaranteed to be free of manufacturer's defect.
